The parents of an individual with an autosomal recessive condition each carry one copy of the mutated gene, but they typically do not show signs and symptoms of the condition. However, some carriers may have decreased bone mineral density.",GHR,osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome
What are the treatments for osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of osteoporosis-pseudoglioma
